    Fluid ingredient that matches if any of the child ingredients match.

    EmptyFluidIngredient
    Singleton that represents an empty fluid ingredient.
    FluidIngredient
    This class serves as the fluid analogue of an item Ingredient, that is, a representation of both a predicate to test FluidStacks against, and a list of matching stacks for e.g.
    FluidIngredientType<T extends FluidIngredient>
    This represents the "type" of a FluidIngredient, providing means of serializing and deserializing the ingredient over both JSON and network, using the FluidIngredientType.codec and FluidIngredientType.streamCodec, respectively.
    IntersectionFluidIngredient

    SingleFluidIngredient
    Fluid ingredient that only matches the fluid of the given stack.
    SizedFluidIngredient
    Standard implementation for a FluidIngredient with an amount.
    TagFluidIngredient
    Fluid ingredient that matches all fluids within the given tag.
